segments.text: Do you know that the dolphin is the most intelligent animal in the world ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Dolphins have a big brain and they are very smart . They are also the fastest swimmers in the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are . I read a story about a dolphin saving a A from drowning in the sea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I read that story too . They seem to be able to understand men .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They sure can . Maybe they can interact with men better than monkeys and apes .
segments.speaker: S2
